author: mandrenguyen
body:
Many generators need to be boosted to do asymmetric collisions, which is what we have for pPb.
We update the boost cffs for pPb and Pbp.
The ones with 'match' in the name grab the vertex from a background event, using the mixing module in the same as in the standard PbPb workflows.
The Run2*Boost ones grab the vertex smearing parameters for 50 ns pp, which are currently what's being used for pPb simulation for trigger preparation purposes.
These will eventually be updated with more realistic parameters for physics production, when better predictions for the beam conditions become available.

These were tested as follows.
GEN-SIM background:
cmsDriver.py AMPT_PPb_5020GeV_MinimumBias_cfi --conditions auto:run2_mc -n 1 --era Run2_2016 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG -s GEN,SIM --datatier GEN-SIM --beamspot Run2PbPBoost

GEN-SIM mixing:
cmDriver.py Pyquen_DiJet_pt80to120_2760GeV_cfi --conditions auto:run2_mc -s GEN,SIM --pileup_input file:./AMPT_PPb_5020GeV_MinimumBias_cfi_GEN_SIM.root --era Run2_2016 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --pileup HiMixGEN --datatier GEN-SIM --beamspot MatchPPbBoost --scenario HeavyIons

DIGI mixing:
cmsDriver.py step2 step2 --conditions auto:run2_mc_50ns --pileup_input file:./AMPT_PPb_5020GeV_MinimumBias_cfi_GEN_SIM.root --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT -s DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW-HLTDEBUG --pileup HiMix --filein file:./Pyquen_DiJet_pt80to120_2760GeV_cfi_GEN_SIM_PU.root --era Run2_50ns

Note that --scenario HeavyIons is needed in the GEN-SIM mixing step to put the mixing module in the Path. This doesn't hurt, since the HI event content is a superset of the pp one. However, the implementation should be cleaned up.

A backport to 80X will also be made.
title: Point to 50ns vtx smearing for boosted pPb and clean up
